snippet: The undisputed winners of a legislative battle over the nation’s tax code are the lobbying shops, which often work to simply preserve the status quo.
abstract: Lobbying shops in Washington are seen as undisputed winners of legislative battle over nation’s tax code; after supporting 3-year overhaul to lower corporate tax rates, many are now working to make sure package never becomes law; twist reflects how tax lobbying is on the rise, with lobbying firms profiting enormously as corporations and groups registering to lobby on tax matters has surged.

byline.original: By ERIC LIPTON and JONATHAN WEISMAN

lead_paragraph: The undisputed winners of a legislative battle over the nation’s tax code are the lobbying shops, which often work to simply preserve the status quo.

headline.main: Corporate Lobbyists Assail Tax Overhaul They Once Cheered
headline.print_headline: Lobbyists Who Once Cheered Tax Overhaul Now Work to Kill It
